UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Peptides from Porcine Blood Cruor Hydrolysates as a Promising Source of Antifungal Activity
Literature.Author: García-Vela S, Cournoyer A, Sánchez-Reinoso Z, Bazinet L

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli MP4100(no activity data),Listeria ivanovii HPB 28(no activity data),Rhodotorula mucilaginosa 27173(MIC=375µM),Paecilomyces spp. 5332-9a(MIC=625µM),Paecilomyces spp. 5332-9a(MFC=625µM),Candida guilliermondii(no activity data),Candida parapsilosis(no activity data),Debaryomyces hansenii(MIC=312µM),Aspergillus versicolor LMA 370(MIC=312µM),Aspergillus niger ATCC 1015(no activity data),Penicillium commune(no activity data),Penicillium chrysogenum LMA 212(MIC=156µM),Eurotium rubrum(MIC=312µM),Mucor racemosus LMA 722(no activity data)
